brief.brief: The input fields from the Request (cm3r) or Task (cm3t) databases to use to determine to whom to send the mail message.
This field enables you to control to whom to send the message when the specified Event occurs.

detail.detail: The contents of the field can be a Group name, an operator ID (name) or an operator Name (full name) or any combination of these.
You can specify any number of fields. Specify at least one field name per Message definition.
The referenced field can be a scalar character (type 2) or arrayed character (8/2) input field.
